fields.title: encore-api-cli <version> is released
fields.value:
README is <https://pypi.anymotion.jp/encore-api-cli/README.html|here>.
Release note is <https://pypi.anymotion.jp/encore-api-cli/CHANGELOG.html|here>.
How to install:
```pip install -U encore-api-cli --extra-index-url https://pypi.anymotion.jp```
